text: Let's work together to prevent cervical cancer! 🎉💪🏼👫 Did you know that it's a preventable disease? 🤔 Stay informed and protect yourself with vaccination, Pap tests, and HPV tests. 💉👍🏼📉 Massachusetts offers free breast and cervical cancer screening! 🎁💕🏥 Take advantage of it! 🤩 If diagnosed, consult an oncologist ASAP for treatment. 🙌🏼💪🏼 Let's spread awareness and support each other! 💖🎉
